Date: Wednesday, 4/2/1989
Subject: Doug Drabek
Doug Drabek is ready to be activated from the DL!

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Barry Jones
Dear Sir,
Barry Jones is doing pretty good at AA Huntsville Stars!
He has an ERA of 2.31, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Mickey Brantley
Dear Sir,
Mickey Brantley has nothing more to prove at A Modesto A's!
He has an AVG of .284 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
